member.name: T:TingenDevDeploy.Program
member.summary: The main class for Tingen DevDeploy.
member.remarks:
This class doesn't do much, it just calls the DeploymentProcess method
from the TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy namespace.

member.name: M:TingenDevDeploy.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for Tingen DevDeploy.
member.remarks:
The configuration file path is hard coded to "./AppData/devdeploy-conf.json".
Since this is a console application, we will pass useCli as true.
